content.question: Rivett-Carnacâ€™s point of view is directly relevant in understanding all of the following features of the report EXCEPT

choices.label: the fact that the report expresses hope that the railroad will allow more cotton to be exported out of Berar province
the fact that the report claims that the railroad will have the effect of more labor being available for cotton cultivation
the fact that the report states the railroad would lead to a reduction in the area of Berar covered by jungle
the fact that the report envisions that the railroad will be used to import British textiles that would undersell Indian-made cloth

content.answer: the fact that the report states the railroad would lead to a reduction in the area of Berar covered by jungle

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
